attributes.action: Bring our military home from needless war and use them to truly protect our nation by putting them on the streets.
attributes.additional_details: Bring our military home from needless war and use them to truly protect our nation by putting them on the streets.  A military presence even though they have had large cuts just like the police force they can be used to help secure our cities, our homes, our communities. A Soldier joins the military to protect that which he loves. This is the best place for them.
